features.featureTitle: Download the image at https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_400_400/B4DZw8fRO0HwAg-/0/1770541359476?e=1773878400&v=beta&t=hNLsHkQFnEh-Boegm1kbBhX7F8u1P42PUa-DT2DJzkk and save it as the profile photo static asset, then update HeroSection.tsx to use this new image as the profile picture, replacing any previously set profile photo.
